channel.title: EC2 on Colin's blog
channel.description: Recent content in EC2 on Colin's blog

item.title: AWS EC2
item.description: In this post we’re going to walk through setting an AWS EC2 (elastic compute cloud) instance. During the course of this post we’ll talk through some of the different options available and why they’re important. Up until now we’ve been going over what some may consider boring. IAM Permissions and VPC Networking are not necessarily at the top of everyone’s list of things they have queued up to learn. Well I have good news, we’re going to have a pair of web servers running in EC2 by the time you finish reading this post.
